description: Test prompts by instantly reflecting your message back. Validate formatting and round-trip behavior in your workflows. Debug integrations quickly with a predictable response.

tools.name: getSoftwareProductDetails
tools.title: Get Software Product Details
tools.description:
Retrieves version, release url, and lifecycle details for software products 
      from the database. Supports queries such as:
      - "release URL of Microsoft Office 2024"
      - "Current version of .NET 8"
      - "End of life date for Windows Server 2019"
      - "get lifecycle data of any product"

query.description: query about software version, release, or lifecycle details.

tools.name: getDataFromQDrantDB
tools.title: Get Data From QDrant vector DB
tools.description: Retrieves data from QDrant DB. Just send a users query.
